description: This walk links the Thames Path and North Downs Way National Trails. It runs for about 15 miles through countryside, woodland and common land. The walk starts in Kingston upon Thames and heads south along the Hogsmill River to Epsom Common, Ashtead Common National Nature Reserve, Horton Country Park and Mickelham Downs. The route finishes at Westumble near the pretty Box Hill Country Park in Surrey.
